text: int main ( ) { long t , n , j , k , s1 = 0 , s2 = 0 , i ; long a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%ld" , & t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; s1 = 0 ; s2 = 0 ; for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { for ( k = 0 ; k <= j ; k ++ ) scanf ( "%ld" , & a [ j ] [ k ] ) ; } for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { s1 += a [ j ] [ 0 ] ; s2 += a [ j ] [ j ] ; } if ( s1 > s2 ) printf ( "%ld\n" , s1 + ! ( n % 2 ) ) ; if ( s1 < s2 ) printf ( "%ld\n" , s2 + ! ( n % 2 ) ) ; } return 0 ; }
